casebody.data:
MILLER INDUSTRIES CO v ROMAN, et No 10159. Decided March 10, 1930 A. R. Edgerton and Price Janson, both of Cleveland, for Industries Co. Melville W. Vickery, Cleveland, for Roman, et. WILLIAMS, J and RICHARDS, J (6th Dist) sitting.

Ohio Appeals, 8th Dist, Cuyahoga Co

*250Richards, J., concurs.
